option.name: originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
option.value:
import os import shutil
async def upload_pdf(files): os.makedirs("uploads", exist_ok=True) for file in files: file_location = f"uploads/{file.filename}" # Read file content asynchronously content = await file.read() with open(file_location, "wb") as file_object: file_object.write(content) print(f"Saved file: {file_location}") return {"message": "Files uploaded successfully"}

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
import os import shutil
async def upload_pdf(files): os.makedirs("uploads", exist_ok=True) for file in files: file_location = f"uploads/{file.filename}" # Read file content asynchronously content = await file.read() with open(file_location, "wb") as file_object: file_object.write(content) print(f"Saved file: {file_location}") return {"message": "Files uploaded successfully"}
